subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The United States will be the top seed in the International Crown, a new L.P.G.A. Tour team event to be held July 24 to 27 at Caves Valley in Maryland.
snippet: The United States will be the top seed in the International Crown, a new L.P.G.A. Tour team event to be held July 24 to 27 at Caves Valley in Maryland.
